lexUnit.name: ejection.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: ejection is a derivative of eject

sentence.text: Following the ejection of Richard Baxter along with 2,000 or so of his fellow pastors in 1662 , these Nonconforming ministers were persecuted ruthlessly by the authorities .
